type X509ExtensionCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示 与证书关联的对象的集合。This class represents a collection of objects associated with a certificate. 这些扩展可提供有关证书的其他信息。These extensions can provide additional information about the certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 对象的访问。

span.span: Gets an object that you can use to synchronize access to the object.

value.span: 一个对象，它可用于同步对 对象的访问。

span.span: An object that you can use to synchronize access to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性实现 接口。This property implements the interface. 基于的 .NET Framework 类 使用属性提供其自己的同步版本的集合 。The .NET Framework classes based on provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the property. 使用数组的类也可以使用属性来实现自己的同步 。Classes that use arrays can also implement their own synchronization using the property. 同步代码必须对集合的 属性执行操作，而不是直接对集合执行操作。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the property of the collection, not directly on the collection. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它与可能同时修改集合的其他线程保持正确的同步。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection. 请注意，的某些实现 可能会返回数组本身。Note that some implementations of might return the array itself. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合是同步的，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举器引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
